title: Nonnullas Observationes atque Stricturas in Dn. Joachimi Langii, Verbi div. Ministri Berolin. & Gymnasii Fridericiani Rectoris Theologiæ, ut vocat, Pseudorthodoxæ speciatim Schelguigianæ Ideam modest`e & `e veritatis orthodoxæ amore
creator: Rumpaeus, Iustus Wesselus  Menckenius, Johannes Fridericus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Rumpaeus, Iustus Wesselus  Menckenius, Johannes Fridericus: Nonnullas Observationes atque Stricturas in Dn. Joachimi Langii, Verbi div.
